config.help: you can specify IP address to env variable AE4_DEVICE_IP for single device connection at execution time
config.help_windows: first you set AE4_DEVICE_IP=192.168.0.100 to system environment, then you run <your executable>
config.connection_timeout_help: if exceeding this setting (seconds), we give up connecting to ip1,ip2,..., 0 means infinite trying

debug_help: set to 1 to show socket connect error logs in console, default is 0 (socket error log disabled)
